# 微信小程序教程（歪脖网）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/weixin-xiao-chengxu-jiaocheng-wai-bowang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/weixin-xiao-chengxu-jiaocheng-wai-bowang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install weixin-xiao-chengxu-jiaocheng-wai-bowang
weixin-xiao-chengxu-jiaocheng-wai-bowang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g weixin-xiao-chengxu-jiaocheng-wai-bowang
weixin-xiao-chengxu-jiaocheng-wai-bowang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
